inputs.name: server_endpoint
inputs.description: Insert the FHIR server endpoint URL for PAS
inputs.title: FHIR Server Endpoint URL

inputs.name: approval_pa_submit_request_payload
inputs.description: Insert Bundle to be sent for PAS Submit Request
inputs.title: PAS Submit Request Payload for Approval Response

inputs.name: denial_pa_submit_request_payload
inputs.description: Insert Bundle to be sent for PAS Submit Request
inputs.title: PAS Submit Request Payload for Denial Response

inputs.name: pended_pa_submit_request_payload
inputs.description: Insert Bundle to be sent for PAS Submit Request
inputs.title: PAS Submit Request Payload for Pended Response

inputs.name: pa_inquire_request_payload
inputs.description: Insert Bundle to be sent for PAS Inquiry Request
inputs.title: PAS Inquiry Request Payload

inputs.name: must_support_pa_submit_request_payload
inputs.description: Insert an additional request bundle or a list of bundles (e.g. [bundle_1, bundle_2])
inputs.title: Additional PAS Submit Request Payloads

inputs.name: must_support_pa_inquire_request_payload
inputs.description: Insert an additional request bundle or a list of bundles (e.g. [bundle_1, bundle_2])
inputs.title: Additional PAS Inquiry Request Payloads
